body_html:
I just followed the Setting up TensorFlow for Development instructions.

bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

mkdir _python_build
cd _python_build
ln -s ../bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/org_tensorflow/* .
ln -s ../tensorflow/tools/pip_package/* .
python3 setup.py develop
body_text:
I just followed the Setting up TensorFlow for Development instructions.
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

mkdir _python_build
cd _python_build
ln -s ../bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/org_tensorflow/* .
ln -s ../tensorflow/tools/pip_package/* .
python3 setup.py develop
body:
I just followed the [Setting up TensorFlow for Development](https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup#setting_up_tensorflow_for_development) instructions.

```
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

mkdir _python_build
cd _python_build
ln -s ../bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/org_tensorflow/* .
ln -s ../tensorflow/tools/pip_package/* .
python3 setup.py develop
```
